content: this overlay mosaic blanket square is worked from the center out it makes a 6 x6 square you ll just need a few yards of worsted weight yarn in 2 colors and a size j/6mm hook this square was featured in the \ melange blanket cal hosted by underground crafter \ \ 1\ i**f you like mosaic patterns** be sure to check out \* nordic star blanket /patterns/library/nordic-star-blanket \* monthly mosaic mystery cal /patterns/sources/monthly-mosaic-mystery-cal \* mosaic nordic blanket cal /patterns/sources/mosaic-nordic-blanket-cal \ 1\ https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/12/30/melange-blanket-crochet-along/ https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/12/30/melange-blanket-crochet-along/
